__TOC__

{{http://softwarefreedomday.org/Home?action=AttachFile&do=get&target=softwarefreedomday2008logo.png}}

Software Freedom Day is a worldwide celebration of Free and Open Source Software. In Singapore, the Linux User Group Singapore (LUGS) and Singapore Linux Meetup Group (SLMG) will be organising this inaugural event. Ubuntu will be featured in this event. 

'''The Event'''
{| class="wikitable"
|-
| Date
| 20 September 2008 (Sat)
|-
| Time
| 10 AM until 5 PM
|-
| Venue
| School of Information Systems building, Singapore Management University <nowiki>[[http://www.smu.edu.sg/campus/map/index.asp|(Campus map)]]</nowiki>
|}

== Highlights ==
* Intel will be showcasing Moblin, a PC-like portable device which is based on Ubuntu.
* Install-fest by SLMG
* And many other exciting activities!

Everyone is welcome! For more details, you may wish to visit the <nowiki>[[http://www.softwarefreedomday.sg | Software Freedom Day (Singapore) website]]</nowiki>.
